title: Ouidius Naso his Remedie of love. Translated and intituled to the youth of England
author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D.
publisher: Printed by T. C[reede] for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetstreet, at the signe of the Bible,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
